Package edu.cs495.engine.gfx.requests

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRequest
    A render request is a comparable object sent to the renderer for processing (and sorting) before drawing graphics to the screen.
    BoxOverlayRequest  
    BoxRequest
    This is an AbstractRequest which will encapsulate a Box and where to draw it.
    EllipseRequest
    This is an AbstractRequest which will encapsulate an Ellipse and where to draw it.
    ImageOverlayRequest
    This is an AbstractRequest wrapper which will encapsulate an Image and where to draw it with screen parameters.
    ImageRequest
    This is an AbstractRequest which will encapsulate an Image and where to draw it.
    LightRequest
    This is an AbstractRequest which will encapsulate a Light and where to draw it.
    OverlayRequest
    This is an AbstractRequest which will encapsulate an Image and where to draw it.
